title: Jax is more OP than Irelia
body:
He can jump on someone and jump back also, he can do Katarina jump with ward.
but but but {{champion:39}}  stun 
About that stun we don't have to talk about, because jax doesn't only have stun, he can also replace it with teemos Q and then stun and it's always stun, not that someone has to have higher hp bar
both are op as fuck when ahead except jax is safer and he beats irelia 1v1 so, not many champs can duel him late... irelia can be dueled by fucking yasuo late, try to duel jax as yasuo, yi or some shit late and u would get fucked.

replies.body:
Jax is not more op than irelia.  She has both true damage (very good against jax and other top fighters), and Sustain something all top laners would kill to have.  On top of that she has cc reduction.

Late game and more importantly mid game she can not be dueled by yasuo, maybe jax if he outplays her, yi nope.

Irelia and to a lesser extent jax change in power based on their items strength.  When trinity got buffed irelia got buffed because her entire game is based on that item.

The Irelia vs Jax matchup comes down to both their E

If Jax maxes E first for the lower cooldown he will probably win

> [{quoted}](name=dangopee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RuhwG6PN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-16T05:21:25.950+0000)
>
> The Irelia vs Jax matchup comes down to both their E
> 
> If Jax maxes E first for the lower cooldown he will probably win

No he wont.Cause jax gonna lose tons of dmg for not maxing W.

> [{quoted}](name=dangopee,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RuhwG6PN,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-16T05:21:25.950+0000)
>
> The Irelia vs Jax matchup comes down to both their E
> 
> If Jax maxes E first for the lower cooldown he will probably win

jax can max whatever he wants
when a 0-9 jax can 1v1 7-0 vayne u know that champ is just broken
jax has katarina jump ward, irelia has no escape

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RuhwG6PN,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-16T18:45:52.060+0000)
>
> jax has katarina jump ward, irelia has no escape

Irelia has true damage Jax hasn't.You don't be kid.

> [{quoted}](name=Akatsuki Deidara,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RuhwG6PN,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-06-17T00:21:46.716+0000)
>
> Irelia has true damage Jax hasn't.You don't be kid.

she doesn't have katarina jump and teemos Q
This is the most random piece of rubbish I've ever read in my life.

It's always the East that use the term rubbish

I feel so left out in the west. '^'
British people use it a lot too. They are west. Well not for u if u live in na.

I mean, when you play squishy people like Yasuo or Yi into Jax, you'll lose. 

Way later in the game, and very early you might win. With Yi, it's all about dodging the stun and crit him to death late game.

 The best thing I can recommend against Jax that I find impossible to beat unless you are very far ahead, and even then you can still be outplayed by, are OK Vayne and Quinn players imo. 

The biggest problem with Jax is that he can't gap close after his Q for a few seconds, so if you can interrupt it or disengage him easily, you should be fine.

> [{quoted}](name=Happy Honker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RuhwG6PN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-16T04:02:42.203+0000)
>
> En ingles por favor.

yo no hablo espanyol muy bien pero siempre voy a saber decir: viva espana alzad los brazos, hijos del pueblo espanol que vuelve a resugir!!!
I'm having difficulty understanding your ideas is all.
Don't cry Irelia and Fizz main.Irelia more op.
